title: 227: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 7 (Chris Harrison Getting Fired? + Matt Leaves Half the Women!)
itunes:title: 227: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 7 (Chris Harrison Getting Fired? + Matt Leaves Half the Women!)
description:
First The Broads discuss the most recent Bachelor Nation news (see below for #firechrisharrison petition) and then they dive into the latest Bachelor episode aka the week before Hometowns. They chat about Heather attempting to join the cast and the ladies reaction, Serena P’s one on one date round two, the group date filled with emotions, Kit missing her penthouse, Jessenia and Matt on another dangerous date, Matt letting people go left and right, ideas for Chris Harrison’s replacement, and much more!


PETITION TO REMOVE CHRIS HARRISON FROM THE FRANCHISE:https://tinyurl.com/ytmnva84


THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***MISEN: Go to MISEN.COM/CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

***ARTICLE: Go to ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY to get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more.
